short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper plugin for job seekers to check their job fit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The nSpire AI platform empowers every job seeker with the tools needed to assess their fit for posted jobs. This plugin makes their job search experience faster and more efficient by providing quick access to job sites like LinkedIn, Indeed, ZipRecruiter, Google Jobs etc. so that they can click a button and check their fit-score based on their nSpire saved profile. Later they can also work on their gaps to improve their job match. Before running the job match, the user must already have a registered account in nSpire platform.
